examples.korean: The transportation operation will be spun off into a separate company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 운송업 부문은 별도 회사로 분리될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The transportation operation will be spun off into a separate company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We will send a carrier to collect the wrong shipment next week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저희가 다음 주에 운송업자를 보내 잘못 발송된 물건은 회수하겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We will send a carrier to collect the wrong shipment next week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The actual freight and delivery was through a freight forwarder you had designated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실제 운송 및 배송은 귀사가 선정한 화물 운송업자가 했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: The actual freight and delivery was through a freight forwarder you had designated. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We have secured a new freight forwarder, and you should receive your container by February 22. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새로운 운송업자를 찾았으므로 2월 22일까지 귀사의 컨테이너를 수령하실 수 있습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We have secured a new freight forwarder, and you should receive your container by February 22. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He is in the freight[shipping] industry. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 화물 운송업에 종사한다 Neungyule
examples.english: He is in the freight[shipping] industry. Add to Wordbook
